class.name: FbParameter

overview.summary: Represents a parameter of a , and optionally, its mapping to DataSet columns. This class cannot be inherited.
overview.remarks: Parameter names are not case sensitive.

class.remarks: Guid values should be passed as Guid instances or byte arrays otherwise the execution of the FbCommand will fail.

property.name: Precision
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of digits used to represent the parameter value.

property.name: Scale
property.summary: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which parameter value is resolved.

property.name: Size
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

property.name: DbType
property.summary: Gets or sets the DbType of the parameter.

property.name: Direction
property.summary: Gets or sets the Direction of the parameter.

property.name: IsNullable
property.summary: Gets or sets whether the parameter accepts null values.

property.name: ParameterName
property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the .

property.name: SourceColumn
property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source column that is mapped to the DataSet and used for loading or returning the Value.

property.name: SourceVersion
property.summary: Gets or sets the DataRowVersion to use when loading value.

property.name: Value
property.summary: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.

property.name: Charset
property.summary: Gets or sets the Charset of the parameter.
property.remarks: The Charset is used only with char and varcar parameters.
